item.title: parted
item.description: Parted 分区 Partition parted /dev/sdc mkpart primary fat32 0% 100% set 1 boot on Format partition mkfs.vfat -F 32 /dev/sdc1 mount iso sudo mkdir /mnt/windows10/ sudo mount -t auto -o -loop /path/to/windows.iso /mnt/windows10 Copy all files in /mnt/windows10 to usbstick mount /dev/sdc1 /mnt/usb screen -S cp cd /mnt/usb/ sudo cp -fr /mnt/windows10/* .
